[Good] nickname = missile04_mark01 equipment = missile04_mark01 category = equipment price = 800000 item_icon = equipment\models\commodities\nn_icons\EQUIPICON_missilelauncher.3db combinable = false ids_name = 0 ;GENERATESTRRES("Energy Missile Mk1") ids_info = 0 ;GENERATEXMLRES("Energy Missile Mk1
This new Energy Missile Mk1 is a very unique weapon now on the market. With a missile that does the same amount of hull and shield damage on their victim as well as extreme tracking ability. The Energy Missile Mk1 is the 1st generation of its kind. POWER USAGE PER SHOT = 133
